text: The Human Comedy is a 1943 American World War II drama movie directed by Clarence Brown and was based on the 1943 novel of the same name by William Saroyan. It stars Mickey Rooney, Marsha Hunt, Frank Morgan, James Craig, Fay Bainter, Van Johnson, Donna Reed, Dorothy Morris, Darryl Hickman and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. It won an Academy Award in 1944 and was nominated for 4 others. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 drama movies Category:1943 war movies Category:American war movies Category:1940s American drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown
title: The Human Comedy
